reviews:
I would give this bra a 5 star if the strap buckles weren't as visible. Most bras the strap buckles sit toward the back so are not noticable but these when adjusted normally are in the front and they are not black so they stand out so I have to be careful what top I wear it with.
The bra looks great on, they are a larger cut so I had to exchange for a cup size smaller than usual. Pretty comfy too.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: I liked it so much I bought another one. Strong material that stands up. Since I gained weight I've struggled to find a bra that makes 'the girls' look like they did in a Victoria Secret bra. This did it! and for a fraction of the price! I believe true to size.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

review_title: Extremely comfy and practical. Cute but simple at the same time!
reviews:
Got the 38B and it fits perfectly in terms of both cup and band sizes.

Fabric on the bra is super soft, and the the straps don't dig into my shoulders.

Well designed and doesn't show bra lines when wearing tshirts and thin materials.

Its a comfy everyday bra, but it has just a touch of lace and 1 rhinestone in the middle to make me feel fancy! Excellent bra in every way!
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: This is way too big and I have to send it back. I ordered a 42 B because I need the large band and bit smaller cup but this is definitely more like a c or d cup. It’s a little over padded for my liking as well but some may love it, I prefer no padding at all and it’s my mistake , I ordered because of all the good reviews saying it was true to size but it wasn’t for me.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: I was disappointed with this because the last bra I ordered from this company is my favourite bra. Unfortunately, this one seems like a bigger cup, the fit isn't awful but definitely not proper (even though they are both apparently 34DDD) and the sides of it dig into my armpit no matter how much I adjust the straps. The quality of the bra overall is decent for the price if it weren't for the issues mentioned above.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Came in good packaging and was on time. I love the colour and how it’s fits so comfortably. Definitely will be ordering more in the future!! It was so easy to return it since I have lost weight and I knew I was a certain size but they were very accommodating and sent me the size that I wanted. Thanks!!
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews:
I love that it FITS! But it comes up under my arms a bit too high and gets uncomfortable. Not badly enough that I would return, just prevents giving 5-stars.
Great quality construction and materials
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Sizing is way off, it runs very large, but a good bra for the money. Not excellent but if you're on a budget this is much better than other cheap bras.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

review_title: Fits great! Especially for the price!
reviews: I usually order a 34DD for light push up bras and this fit well. The fabric is so soft and it has a nice wide band which is so comfy. I will be ordering more because the price is so great for such a lovely bra! It also came early!
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Nice under clothes as it can’t be seen. Fits perfectly and so comfortable that I end up wearing it almost every day. Definitely worth the money
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Buy a cup size smaller. Bra has good support around and wider straps. Does not cut into skin. Soft feel and comfortable. Great for everyday use. Able to wear for long hours. Very happy with the purchase.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: I liked the colour but found the seams showed through my cloths & it was more heavily padded than I had wanted.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Runs big in the cup... returned and went down to a C still little big but do able!!! Comfortable if you like lace....
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: I suggest you size up. This came really small, tight and shoulder straps are super short.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

reviews: Way too big. A 42A cup looks more like a 42DDD. Returned it.
product_name: Smart & Sexy Womens Perfect Push-up Bra Padded Bra

review_title: Great quality bra for amazing price!
reviews: Soft material, thick band which I like (3 prongs rather than 2) and it has a little cushion but nothing too crazy (for push up) I will be repurchasing in all colours available! I got black, next is nude. :)
